verses.name: Luke 1:9
verses.text: According to the custom of the priest’s office, his lot was to burn incense when he went into the temple of the Lord.

verses.name: Luke 1:10
verses.text: And the whole multitude of the people were praying without at the time of incense.

verses.name: Luke 1:11
verses.text: And there appeared unto him an angel of the Lord standing on the right side of the altar of incense.

verses.name: Luke 1:12
verses.text: And when Zacharias saw him, he was troubled, and fear fell upon him.
